item.title: About
item.description: I (Colin Cannon) work at Ideaventions Academy in Reston Virginia, the highest rated school for STEM education in the state. I work as the uppler level mathmatics and economics teacher. I teach students from grades 6 to 12 starting at Algebra I all the way up to AP Calculus, Statistics, Micro and Macroeconomics. My drive each and every dayis to illuminate how math and reasoning illuminate the truth on how our world behaves.
